docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Jan. 13 -- The general feeling in interAmerican conference circles tonight as the opening time approaches was that some solution would be found for the paramount issue -- Argentina's position. This was freely voiced by...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Jan. 13 -- The general feeling in interAmerican conference circles tonight as the opening time approaches was that some solution would be found for the paramount issue -- Argentina's position. This was freely voiced by delegates, though no specific information was claimed on which to base it.

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Jan. 14 -- The third conference of the Foreign Ministers of the American republics held since the outbreak of the war in Europe to deal with problems in the Western Hemisphere raised by the war will assemble formally tomorrow...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Jan. 14 -- The third conference of the Foreign Ministers of the American republics held since the outbreak of the war in Europe to deal with problems in the Western Hemisphere raised by the war will assemble formally tomorrow with the proposal that the twenty-one republics break all relations with the Axis as its paramount issue.

docs.snippet: Juan Carlos Blanco, Ambassador of Uruguay to the United States, is notifying holders of dollar bonds of the Republic of Uruguay that the republic is extending the period for exchange of these bonds for new readjustment bonds. The offer will remain...
docs.lead_paragraph: Juan Carlos Blanco, Ambassador of Uruguay to the United States, is notifying holders of dollar bonds of the Republic of Uruguay that the republic is extending the period for exchange of these bonds for new readjustment bonds. The offer will remain open until such date as may be hereafter determined.

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Jan. 15 -- In the Palacio Tiradentes, where Congress formerly met, President Getulio Vargas this afternoon opened the conference of American Foreign Ministers with an inaugural address punctuated by enthusiastic applause from...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Jan. 15 -- In the Palacio Tiradentes, where Congress formerly met, President Getulio Vargas this afternoon opened the conference of American Foreign Ministers with an inaugural address punctuated by enthusiastic applause from delegates and from the crowded visitors' galleries.

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Jan. 17 -- The leading delegates to the Conference of American Foreign Ministers, including Dr. Oswaldo Aranha of Brazil and Sumner Welles of the United States, held conferences this afternoon under circumstances indicating...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Jan. 17 -- The leading delegates to the Conference of American Foreign Ministers, including Dr. Oswaldo Aranha of Brazil and Sumner Welles of the United States, held conferences this afternoon under circumstances indicating progress in the move for a South American break with the Axis powers.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; WEEK ENDED JA.N. 17, 1942

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Jan. 18 -- One South American country was prepared to break off relations with the Axis powers from the scene of the conference of American Foreign Ministers, now under way here, and thereby force a decision by the conference...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Jan. 18 -- One South American country was prepared to break off relations with the Axis powers from the scene of the conference of American Foreign Ministers, now under way here, and thereby force a decision by the conference itself, should Argentina unduly delay in joining with the other American republics on this issue, according to a well-substantiated report today.
